website_summaries.verdict: A fun princess playset for fans of Peppa Pig that includes some fun accessories.
pros: Comes with Princess Peppa and Princess Suzy figures, bed, mirror, treasure chest, throne, dining table with chairs, and a tea set
Castle folds up and locks for storage and has a carrying handle
Durable and ideal for ages 2 and up
cons: The lock is too hard for some kids to do by themselves

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves Her Peppa Castle!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this castle! What’s even better is that it folds up and has a handle to carry it from place to place.
customer_reviews.author: southernbelle

customer_reviews.title: Freakin’ Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this little castle in the daily deals section, I knew my 3 year old daughter had to have it! It’s such a cute portable set that we plan to expand by purchasing the mini character sets. Definitely gotta get the Peppa Christmas tree set when it’s back in stock. So the little blue door likes to pop off, so we may have to permanently glue it down. 🤷🏽‍♀️ Other than that, it’s a really good deal. I snagged it for sixteen bucks.
customer_reviews.author: IrieMade

customer_reviews.title: Cute castle but small
customer_reviews.text: This is really small. It's my fault I should have looked at the dimensions, but for the amount of money it cost I was really shocked and disappointed by how little this is. It's cute and my daughter likes it but this should be half the price that it is. Just check the dimensions first so you know what you're getting
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I kind of hate this toy. I know, I know, I'm the mom, and I don't play with it, but I hate how it has a bunch of little pieces of furniture and figurines with no place to store them other than inside the castle then they fall out the windows or drawbridge which doesn't stay closed, also the castle itself won't stay closed. My daughter plays with it the least of all her Christmas toys. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dipenkara

customer_reviews.title: The packaging is a total let down for kids not old enough to read.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old granddaughter and I'm told she loves it. I was disappointed in the packaging though. It arrived in a cardboard box with lettering saying what was inside, no pictures that she could identify with. Instead of her opening a gift of her favorite character and seeing a picture, she had to wait till everyone went home before Mom could open it and show her what it was.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie & Stan

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but as with other Peppa house sets . .  .
customer_reviews.text: There is an issue with hinged doorways. We have the bakery and that door is forever popping off the hinges but it will at least stay closed. The castle door pops off AND won't stay closed. This is not a huge deal during actual play as long as your kid is not prone to being upset by little details, but if you store figures/accessories in the houses, prepare for there to be some potential messes.
customer_reviews.author: RooZillah

customer_reviews.title: The girls will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift. easy to open packaging and nothing to assemble. Was a hit for the birthday girl and the girls started playing right away.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: My 2yo daughter loves this castle
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. My only complaint is she is 2 and cannot close it to the folding and carrying position. The latch is hard to line up and push down properly. Comes with characters and home items which she enjoys.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle Germanich

customer_reviews.title: NOT A GOOD PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Peppa Pig Princess Castle for my 3-year-old granddaughter for her Christmas present. She loves Peppa Pig and houses, castles, etc. to go with her toys. She loved the present, however, the quality of the castle is not very good at all. The latch on the top that keeps that castle closed will not stayed closed. So, as she is carrying it around, it falls open. It just is not a quality toy.
customer_reviews.author: BARGAINSEEKER

customer_reviews.title: MORE TOYS ALWAYS  MORE TOYS HELP ME PLS GOD OH HELP ME
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe we got ANOTHER child castle/playset/treehouse/etc etc etc. WHATEVER! Lets have a million little pieces of junk all over the house why the heII not. My daughter loves it, she plays with it a lot and throws it around like nobody’s business. It’s done more damage to my walls than it has taken so that speaks volumes for it’s build quality. Don’t get me started on the quality of the pieces you step on in the middle of the night, they should be used for bullet proof vests.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewFever

customer_reviews.title: NEW product should come in original packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a NEW Peppa Pig Castle for my granddaughter’s birthday. I also ordered the Peppa Pig Carriage. The carriage came in adorable packaging. The castle came with NO packaging in a brown corrugated box. Where is the cute packaging that helps this castle look way more presentable as a gift? I am VERY disappointed. Lisa Nash
customer_reviews.author: dennis Nash

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Updated review. Really cute castle but everything was missing out of it. None of the play pieces were included! Castle won’t latch and the drawbridge door falls off. 2 year old still was excited for Peppa Pig for her birthday and doesn’t want to send it back and wait for a replacement. She uses her little people until the Peppa Pig set I had to order comes in. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emma V

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how cheap this product was and I don't mean dollar-wise. It doesn't stay closed the castle is just not madewell very cheaply made! Especially for the money I paid for it....
customer_reviews.author: pavalkado

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price tag. Just a cheap dollar store value castle with some peppa pig figures thrown in. Not bad for a childs gift but is only worth half or less of the price. Also comes in an unattractive box.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this! you can't buy these sets anywhere but on amazon. so I am glad I found them here. My toddler loves to play with her castle. For the price its a nice size castle that can be used to store her little Peppa characters and tote around.
customer_reviews.author: 30secondreviewer

customer_reviews.title: can not be closed tightly
customer_reviews.text: all the things are good except the castle's" to go "button, it's really tight and will take the grown-up a few minutes to close it and not friendly with the kids, my kids love peppa though
customer_reviews.author: Evan Zhou

customer_reviews.title: One of my Daughters favorite toys
customer_reviews.text: For the price this was a very nice toy for our daughter. Fun little castle with rooms and decorations. The furniture and characters that came with it were pretty nice too. It’s easy to pack up and carry around as well. This has become one of my daughters favorite toys
customer_reviews.author: BJP

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I felt this was cheaply made. My grandaughter will love it anyway as I bought 2 different castles. I would not spend my money on these again.
customer_reviews.author: susieq2345

customer_reviews.title: The kids will love it. Package is drama.
customer_reviews.text: My niece wanted to sleep with it. Great toy, came in a massive box. Simply massive. Very difficult to get out of the packing. But the toy was very well received by the kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: Sharan

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute and works good for storage
customer_reviews.text: Took 2 weeks to arrive as they lost the package. They issued me a refund and still let me keep the item once they found it. The castle door broke off but my two year old is rather rough with toys. She adores Peppa pig and LOVES this castle. It’s small, easy for her to carry, and it holds all her Peppa pig figures (15 in total- with room for a few more) overall I’m happy that she’s happy with this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 year old daughter. It’s perfect for a young toddler. She loves it. Big enough to keep her entertained. Small enough that it doesn’t take up too much space. I love that it folds right up with the pieces fitting inside.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Cute tiny castle
customer_reviews.text: Nice small Peppa castle. I thought it should be bigger for the price. I bought another Peppa house and it was around the same price, but much bigger and with a lot of pieces included. My daughters like it, I just thought it was expensive.
customer_reviews.author: meli melenciano

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by the number of small items that come with the castle and the characters themselves. Their arms move, their legs move to sit and stand, their heads rotate. For the price I wasn't expected much but was pleasantly surprised at the quality
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but not worth the price. I should have paid closer attention to the measurements, cause it's quite small and disappointing in my eyes. My granddaughter loves it though.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift for my best friends daughter ‘s 3rd birthday. What we loved about it was all the pieces were there you didn’t have to purchase a lot more things. And it didn’t take up a lot of room! You can also tote it easily! It is very nicely made also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy 4yo girl :)
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, I thought it was kind of pricy but Amazon had the best price. I checked a lot of places. This was my 4yo #1 Christmas request. She was thrilled. I like that all the pieces can go inside the castle for storage. Also like that there’s not too many pieces or anything too small. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: C. Price

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with Peppa Pig. We’re trying to get all the toys we can, but this one by far holds her attention the longest. It’s a good price for a good quality toy.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: RIP off!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so tiny! And it doesn't stay closed so what's the point of having a handle on it!? Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peppa Pig
customer_reviews.text: This does not come in normal store packaging. It arrived in a plain cardboard box. I honestly thought that some of what you pay for is how the product is displayed. Anyway my daughters love Peppa Pig and they loved this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Ysaak

customer_reviews.title: Girlie toys are ok too!
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for two year old great grandchild. She has older brother so has lots of toys, but I thought it was fun for her to also receive a “girlie” toy. It was a success.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: For the discount I got it was worth it but full price it is a waste of money. Daughter played with for 10 minutes and then got bored . it doesnt have a lot of pieces and doesnt do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Skbaby

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like the brown box it came in
customer_reviews.text: Love the product itself!!! A little disappointed that it was shipped in the product box and without pictures. So giving it as a gift makes this crappy. A 2 year old doesn’t want to unwrap a present and see a brown box. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kymberly

customer_reviews.title: Not the best Peppa set
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the other Peppa playhouse sets this is made poorly. It doesn’t stay closed and the pieces fall out constantly. So no way to keep pieces somewhat together.
customer_reviews.author: Amber May

customer_reviews.title: love these peppa toys very high quality - well made
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about these toys. My daughter plays with them for hours and hours. The plastic used and colors are very high quality, and the frustration free packaging was a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Moran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my toddler. She’s recently become infatuated with “Peppa Pig”, so I surprised her with this castle. She loves it and plays with it daily. I love that it folds up and you can enclose the included toys with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bayly

customer_reviews.title: Every little Girl Loves A Castle!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loved it! Shouted Castle! And loved it was pink and all the furniture items inside. Very cute
customer_reviews.author: Khloes Mom

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun. Imagination included
customer_reviews.text: Good carrying case.Bridge Door did break off from normal use Furniture included is appropriate for figurines
customer_reviews.author: Mrs g

customer_reviews.title: Toddler size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a three year olds birthday gift. She is in love with the pig. She loved it and it is easy to keep all together.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves. Also purchase the Peppa Pig family on Amazon. Perfect for the castle. They are wearing crowns.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Grabo

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute portable castle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for Christmas for my 3yr granddaughter and she absolutely loved it. Came with little peppa pig figurine and little furniture. She plays for hours with it, such a good imagination.
customer_reviews.author: C. Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter's favorite cartoon.
customer_reviews.text: The little one loves playing Peppa, with anything. This is an addition to the picnic set, playground, etc. It is all plastic, easy to clean, transportable, and even has a drawbridge. Fun for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: Judith R in NE Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Toddler approved
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old grand daughter loves this! She gets bored with her toys very quickly but she constantly plays with this.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Hubby

customer_reviews.title: Peppa and Toddler.
customer_reviews.text: Your toddler would love this. The only downfall is the castle door comes off easily when pulled.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: How small can you go?
customer_reviews.text: This item is small. It isn't made for a child of 4. If it had more toys inside that might help but for the money I thought the item would be larger, and the castle have more furniture, etc. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: wvrebl

customer_reviews.title: Very Small
customer_reviews.text: My girls like it, but it was smaller than I thought it would be. Tiny pieces for furniture, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetgirl16

customer_reviews.title: Peppa castle
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on sale black Friday for cousin who loves peppa. Came with peppa and friends. Locks for easy carry.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy, but no customer service contact for missing part
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this, but unfortunately she cannot store and carry the items in the castle as the door was missing and things fall out. There seems to be no contact I can find to contact the seller - which is unusual for Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Janke

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 2yr old niece loved this Christmas gift. It was all assembled and all we did was open the box and play! She loved the furniture and figures. Not too big and it’s easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a total piece of crap when it arrives. When you get it all together it’s not much better
customer_reviews.author: MeganLee

customer_reviews.title: Very enjoyable toy.
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a fun toy for our kids but it’s a bit flimsy. It would be nice if the plastic was a bit sturdier but all in all a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Handy Andy

customer_reviews.title: Kiddo loved it
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprise present for my 3 year old. It's just a cheapy plastic but she loved it so much she just wanted to look at it for the first few days before we were allowed to touch it. Now we get the madrigal music going when we play Peppa Castle. Had to give it 5 stars because of the joy it brought the kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute my almost 3 yr old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very cute my almost 3 yr loves it comes with little furniture a Peppa pig and her friend
customer_reviews.author: Kala

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: It’s expensive toy for what you get. It’s cheap and not many parts
customer_reviews.author: Jason Edmisson

customer_reviews.title: Peppa pig is a princess
customer_reviews.text: Peppa pig is our favorite cartoon character. The princess castle is sure to provide hours of dramatic play with Peppa and her friends.
customer_reviews.author: Donne Compton

customer_reviews.title: Goddaughter is a princess so she got a castle
customer_reviews.text: Sent over seas to Ireland for Xmas for my goddaughter. Hopefully she will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for traveling. I like how you can move the furniture around but wish maybe there were pegs to hold them in place. It closes and the handle is also nice, just wish it clicked closed a bit better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks fake
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED. The shipping box was the only packaging. It was just a brown shipping box with the toy inside - not in any type of package. It looked real illegitimate or used.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t make my mistake... this item is small.
customer_reviews.text: The product is listed and named exactly like the large princess castle in the store - same pictures and everything - but it’s the small version. That is noted way down in the description but the title of the castle and pics are the same as the big one in the store. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: SJSK

customer_reviews.title: Daughter speaks with a British accent while playing with this
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Can take it with you anywhere and helps keep the kids entertained. Easy and quick clean up for the most part. Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystalina

customer_reviews.title: Peppa Pig house
customer_reviews.text: Excellent as described!! My 4 year old daughter is very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonia perry

customer_reviews.title: Peppa pig castle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my granddaughter. She loves it and plays with it all the time
customer_reviews.author: tina m ruse

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my 2 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy! Great for girls 2+, i would recommend also getting the additional peppa pig characters(mama and papa pig).
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My grand baby is constantly playing with it , keeps her occupied for at least one hour at the time . It was so easy to set up , nothing to it , thank you for this
customer_reviews.author: Mssbelle

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it!! Well made a cute little pieces came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great toy and it was really played with at Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I thought it would be. Great value and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: This looks very cute but is so difficult to close with the items inside it. It’s just frustrating and very easily breakable. Mostly it junk.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my co-worker's daughter. It is a little small for the price. Otherwise, my co-worker said she loved it because of the characters (obviously)
customer_reviews.author: Darline St-Juste

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves peppa pig so she adores this castle. It gets used everyday. Still in good condition.

customer_reviews.title: Tea and Crumpets
customer_reviews.text: Weak generation Z toys . But my daughter likes UK cartoons so I can’t be hating

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great!
customer_reviews.text: Entertains a 2 and 4 year old and withstands a 2, almost 3 year old standing on it. 🙄

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just as described delivered with no damage and the packaging was easy to removed you from without any hassle.

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but small. Guess you are paying for the peppa pig name. Granddaughter is happy..

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old niece for Christmas. She seems to enjoy it! Made of a hard plastic, much like Barbie toys.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My goddaughter enjoyed her gift and I love seeing her face so happy on how she loves this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ana C. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy from you again!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Well built with everything there that says it’s included. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small!!
customer_reviews.text: This is cute but much smaller then expected but that's my fault for not reading dimensions!!

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old really likes this!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter loves this toy. She's all about Peppa Pig and this holds her attention.

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute. We love peppa
customer_reviews.text: I thought this much bigger but it's small. It's really cute tho.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it. Just what she wanted for her birthday.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best peppa pig toy we've ever had but far from the worst.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it but felt there could've been more effort put into this toy! I noticed after a few times playing with my daughter gave up on it!

customer_reviews.title: Even my boys love it
customer_reviews.text: Cute !! Love ! Even my boys love playing with this

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for a Peppa Lover
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for a 4yr old who is head over heels for Peppa. She absolutely loved this.

customer_reviews.text: My daughter, who is obsessed with Pippa Pig, spends hours playing with this adorable little play set!

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was way smaller than I anticipated. I would love the option to return it but it's exceeded the date. It's still sitting in the box. I went out and bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jetae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized little castle
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sized little castle. My daughter wanted a castle but I didn’t want to get her something too big. Many castles out there are huge and take up a ton of space. But this one is just the right size. My daughter loves it and the cute little Peppa Pig characters.
customer_reviews.author: Alden M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2,8year old girl. She couldn't be happier. And whats important- she's very busy. The amount of toys and accessories is optimal. Child does not get lost. Perfert for roleplay

customer_reviews.title: kid loves it!

product_meta.title: Peppa Pig's Princess Castle Deluxe Playset
product_meta.description: You are cordially invited to tea at Princess Peppa’s Castle! Explore the castle’s six rooms and experience a day in the life of royalty with Princess Peppa and Princess Suzy. The castle is compatible with all Peppa Pig figures, so you can invite your friends to join the party too! Once you’re finished, Peppa’s castle folds away to store all accessories, and has a carry-handle so you can take your castle on all kinds of adventures!
feature_bullets: You are cordially invited to tea at princess Peppa's castle!
Peppa's castle folds away to store all accessories and includes a handle
Built in scale with your favorite Peppa Pig playsets and compatible with all Peppa Pig figures
Includes Princess Peppa and Princess Suzy articulated figures, a treasure chest, Princess bed, full-size mirror, throne, 3 dining chairs, and a dining table with tea set
Princess Peppa's castle Playset will help make your collection Complete!
Frustration-free packaging: This item ships in simple, recyclable packaging that is easy to open

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,239 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
